SID:Element.SID:Attributes:
<SID:Attribute id="value" atype="lpc_flt" acomment="How dense is the object itself (not what is in it, but what it is made of)?
Values are in specific gravity. If the density is less then 1 it will float, greater then 1 it will sink
(balsa=0.1, mediumwood=0.6, apple=0.8, ice=0.9, water=1, heavy fabric=1.4, stone=2.5, steel=8 )
(See Buiders TWiki DensityValues for more example values)" areadonly="false" aquery="query_intrinsic_density"/>
